## ObjectId class

A class representation of the BSON ObjectId type.

```typescript

```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createFromHexString(hexString)](./oid-lite.objectid.createfromhexstring.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates an ObjectId from a hex string representation of an ObjectId. |
|  [createFromTime(time)](./oid-lite.objectid.createfromtime.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates an ObjectId from a second based number, with the rest of the ObjectId zeroed out. Used for comparisons or sorting the ObjectId. |
|  [equals(otherId)](./oid-lite.objectid.equals.md) |  | Compares the equality of this ObjectId with <code>otherID</code>. |
|  [generate(time)](./oid-lite.objectid.generate.md) | <code>static</code> | Generate a 12 byte id buffer used in ObjectId's |
|  [getTimestamp()](./oid-lite.objectid.gettimestamp.md) |  | Returns the generation date (accurate up to the second) that this ID was generated. |
|  [inspect()](./oid-lite.objectid.inspect.md) |  |  |
|  [isValid(id)](./oid-lite.objectid.isvalid.md) | <code>static</code> | Checks if a value is a valid bson ObjectId |
|  [toHexString()](./oid-lite.objectid.tohexstring.md) |  | Returns the ObjectId id as a 24 character hex string representation |
